settings.heading: Shipping
settings.row_content: We are pleased to offer free USPS shipping on U.S. orders over $100. U.S. orders under $100 incur a flat-rate shipping fee of $8. For expedited shipping, please email hello@epilogicskincare.com. To note: International orders may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees levied by the destination country. These fees are the responsibility of the purchaser and are not included in our international shipping fee.

settings.heading: Returns
settings.row_content: Unopened epi.logic products may be returned for a full item refund (less shipping) to your original form of payment within 15 days of receipt. Opened products or those received over 15 days prior are not eligible for return. To process a return, please emailhello@epilogicskincare.com. Please note that we are unable to accept returns for shipments to Canada, Europe or other international destinations.

settings.heading: Payment
settings.row_content: We are pleased to accept all major credit cards and debit cards. Unfortunately we are unable to accept prepaid gift cards, checks or money orders.

settings.heading: Cancellations
settings.row_content: We cannot guarantee any cancellations or changes once your order is complete, but we are sometimes able to make changes to orders that have not yet shipped. Orders that have already shipped cannot be changed or canceled. If your order has already been dispatched, we will be happy to set up a return for unopened products, within 15 days of receipt. Please emailhello@epilogicskincare.comfor more information.
